text:
RELIGION

Arulmigu Ranganathaswamy Temple, Srirangam : Thai car festival, Namperumal purappadu from kannadi arai, 4.30 a.m.; reaching vagana mandapam, 4.45 a.m.; purappadu in Irattai Prabhai, 5.15 a.m.; purappadu in pallakku, 7.30 a.m.; reaching Veereswaram Asthana Mandapam, noon.; purappadu from the mandapam in Garuda vaganam, 6 p.m.; reaching vagana mandapam, 8.30 p.m.; purappadu from the mandapam, 9 p.m.; reaching kannadi arai, 9.30 p.m.

Arulmigu Mariamman Temple, Samayapuram: Thai poosam festival, Amman thiruveedhi ula in pallakku, 10 a.m.; abishekam, 5 p.m.; maha deeparadhana, 7 p.m.; Amman thiruveedhi ula in Mara Anna vaganam, 8 p.m.; reaching sanctum sanctorum, 9 p.m.

Sri Vishnu Sahasranama Parayana Sabha : Sri Vishnu Sahasranama parayanam, Adhava Residential Complex, 81, Amma Mandapam Road, Srirangam, 6 p.m.

Sri Rama Nama Sath Sangam : Sri Rama Nama parayanam, 92, Balamurugan Street, Amman Nagar, 6 p.m.

GENERAL

District Administration : Public grievances meeting, K.S.Palanisamy, Collector, presides, Collector’s office, 10 a.m.

Tiruchi Corporation: Civic grievances meeting, A.Jaya, Mayor, presides, Corporation Office, 11 a.m.

Nehru Yuva Kendra Sangathan : National Youth Corps volunteers induction training camp, R.Geethanjali Rathinamala, Regional Senior Manager, Sports Development Authority of Tamil Nadu, inaugurates, S.Satheese, Zonal Director, NYK Sangathan, TN, Puducherry and Karnataka, presides, Youth Hostel, 11 a.m.

Rotary Clubs of Tiruchi and Tiruchi Fort : Pongal vizha, Hotel Femina,6.30 p.m.

K.Ramakrishnan College of Engineering : Inauguration of ICTACT and faculty development programme on mobile application development, 10 a.m.

Cauvery College for Women : Valediction of NSS special camp, A.Lakshmi Prabha, NSS Coordinator, Bharathidasan University, speaks, Pettavaithalai, 5 p.m.

Department of Information and Public Relations : Government exhibition, St.John’s Vestry Anglo Indian Higher Secondary School grounds, 4 p.m.

Shiva Automobiles : Unveiling of Mahindra KUV100, Dheeran Nagar, 11.30 a.m.
title: tiruchi today
